recipes.title: onion tomato raita , how to make onion tomato raita

winePairing.pairingText: Sparkling rosé and Sparkling Wine are my top picks for Raita. If you're serving a selection of appetizers, you can't go wrong with these. Both are very food friendly and complement a variety of flavors. The Bellissima Sparkling rosé with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 24 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Bellissima Sparkling Rose
productMatches.description: This is an elegant, bright rosé, with hints of strawberry and grapefruit, and a soft, persistent foam. Uncorked at the very last minute, Bellissima Sparkling Rosé pairs perfectly with smoked salmon, shellfish, and seafood hor d’oeuvres such as tuna tartare, sushi, and sashimi.

recipes.instructions: wash the onion, tomatoes, mint leaves and green chili.finely cut them into small pieces.whisk the curd.add the finely chopped onion, tomato, mint leaves and green chili in the curd.add salt and all the dry spice powders mentioned above.mix them well.garnish the onion tomato raita with mint or coriander leaves and serve with pulao, biryani.
